name: Savior Saga: Idle RPG
description:
Savior Saga: Idle RPG is a new idle RPG with stunning graphics and gorgeous effects.

Join Yuina’s mysterious, yet beautiful journey to find the Dragon Heart while protecting her from endless waves of monsters creeping out from the Devil’s Hall. Strategically collect, upgrade, and build parties of strong, unique Heroes that will adventure alongside Yuina.

The game features a Scenario and Dungeon Mode that presents over 300 upgradable weapons with fun designs, providing beneficial buffs to make your Heroes even stronger.

Start your epic RPG experience now!
